metadata.title: 6mm Round Crystal Ball Post Back Finding Sterling Silver Stud Earrings
features: SPECIFICATIONS: Pure 925 Sterling Silver. Nickel Free.
FASHION: New, Unique jewelry suitable for everyday wear or party. Lightweight & beautiful

Simple gifts are always the best. Silver earrings make great stocking stuffers or impromptu gestures of affections. Silver Earrings are low key and easy to pair with outfits, so it makes a great year round gift for yourself or someone else. French wire, leverback, fish hook and many more earring styles all are beautiful and easy to pair.
description: Glitter and sparkle with these sterling silver earrings featuring pave set. These earrings are studded throughout with creating a unique vibrancy and shine, allowing you to be the life of the party.
